Articles.Content:
Again, Mun.

2099: You are so exited and sad to be almost out of KSP.

3000: You quickly Dematerialize, and destroy the button for fear of Dr. Jerk.
3001: infinte monkeys with typwriters
3002 : A nice pergola garden.
3003: A palindromic room. Everything can switch forwards and backwards and still be the same
3004: a skydiving room 20,000 feet high. For skydiving.
3005: A skydiving room 20,010 feet high. 0.05% better for skydiving than floor 3004

3 hours ago, roboslacker said:

3005: A skydiving room 20,010 feet high. 0.05% better for skydiving than floor 3004

Uh huh. Not even enough space to fly the plane higher?

3006: a huge chunk of land the size of Texas, covered in a mountain range, highlands, plaines, towns, and civillians who are in the center of two huge military bases for a huge airsoft match. Like that giant russian milsim, but better.
3007: launch pad
Floor 3008 : Launch controls
Floor 3009: launch meta-controls
Floor 3010: launch Meta-Meta-über-mega-super- launch controls.
3011:  Fuel controls....all valves are stuck in "OFF" position, so you can push the Launch button all you want but to no avail....
3012 : Launchpad observation deck.
3013: Meta-observation deck. Because the whole launch thing is just a social experiment.
3013: apocalypse bunker.
3014: You begin to question the purpose of climbing this building. @The Jedi Master tells you it's a fourth wall thing, and disappears.
3015 : A public loo.
3016: Hey hey hey, you can now see the entire solar system!
3017: Snack Farm with a random kerbal watering them with explodium.
3018: Happy 1000th anniversary of this post!
3019: A rocket engine, that pushes a kerbal down, making him become a pancake but that suddenly pops back into normal again.
3020: Oh my gosh, it's a herd? horde? pack? of Poptops! (Protector's Broadsword to anyone who knows what I mean.) Oh, wait, on closer inspection, it's just a lot of bunnies.
3021: you marvel at the spaceplanes in this spaceplane museum.
3022: You find copies of every third game Valve ever made, hidden away here from the public eye.
3023: You get hit by a bunch of slow-moving push-shelves.
